definition: slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
cable reel and harness used to lower oneself to safety (e.g. from a building on fire)

sentences.english: Slow down on the plate is set to effectively prevent the crackers, broken parts.
sentences.chinese: 上盤設置了緩降，有效防止了薄脆工件的破碎。

sentences.english: There are slow rise and slow decline functions of tempering.
sentences.chinese: 回火具有緩升緩降功能。
